page.title: 15PLAYGROUND GAMES, CLITHEROE
page.content:
In our playground we play Line Tig and P for Poison.
LINE TIG We have a netball court in our playground and you have to run around the lines. There is one person 'on' and the others run round the lines. When you are 'tug' you stand for ten seconds with your arms open and ten seconds with your arms closed. When you have your arms open the people who have not been 'tug' can run under your arms. If your arms are closed and someone comes up to you who has not been 'tug' they have to wait until you open your arms. The first person to be 'tug' is then on and so the game goes on.
